ISSUE.TITLE: "Recurring-payments" table
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I found a bug in the "recurring-payments" table in 3.90. You have added a new element ("Retry" button) and properly added a new table-head (th) and table-data (td) cells for it. But it seems you forgot to add a <col> element too. This way if the "retry" button is enabled the browser will try to nest 7 table cells into 6 table columns which will cause the table to malfunction. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/46341/nopcommerce-390-beta-released-please-share-your-impressions.aspx?p=7#184561
